competitors.name: Adobe EchoSign
competitors.notes: Adobe's e-signature solution before rebranding to Adobe Sign

competitors.name: SignNow
competitors.notes: E-signature platform, acquired by Barracuda Networks in 2015

competitors.name: RightSignature
competitors.notes: E-signature solution before acquisition by Citrix

context: In 2015, DocuSign was the clear e-signature market leader valued at $3B after funding round. Adobe EchoSign was the main enterprise competitor. The market was growing as digital transformation accelerated e-signature adoption across industries. DocuSign expanded internationally and into real estate transactions. Competition focused on enterprise features, integrations, and mobile capabilities. E-signature was gaining legal acceptance globally.
